question: Which of the following kings Bore the title of “Avanisimha”?
explanation: Peninsular India was ruled by five dynasties which were Cholas, Cheras, Pandyas, Pallavas, and Chalukyas. Simhavishnu who was the successor of Simhavarman ruled from 575 A.D. to 600 A.D. He also Bore the title of “Avanisimha”.
